articles.title: UP CM Yogi Adityanath's order for eateries on Kanwar Yatra routes amid Opposition wrath - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Uttar Pradesh CM Yogi Adityanath on Friday made it mandatory for eateries to mention the name of owners on eateries on Kanwar Yatra route across the state. | Latest News India
articles.content: Uttar Pradesh chief minister Yogi Adityanath on Friday mandated that all eateries along the Kanwar Yatra route must display the names of their owners. This decision followed the Muzaffarnagar Police'… [+2774 chars]
